Email Visibility | Assigned Emails.ask: We need a tool that provides easy visibility of emails assigned to specific individuals.

Email Management | Multiple Inboxes.evidence: Right now, we are opening up every Gmail workspaces, we're sharing passwords to get in. Email Management | Missed Emails.evidence: The number of missed requests, missed deadlines missed. You know, hey, what's my status here's? My purchase order, please put this into production. Email Management | Missed Emails.ask: We need a solution to prevent missed emails, especially for deadlines and client deliverables.

Email Management | Cross-team collaborat.evidence: So to boil it down, it's pretty much look sometimes as I mentioned, sometimes if all of the documentation and all of the information comes in correctly, then there's a chance that we don't have to interact with anybody, right? Email Management | Auto-closing Notifica.evidence: There's a couple emails that are just like sending us an email that someone placed an order? So that's just like wasting our time and space. So, is there a way to flag that? So it doesn't happen.

Security Approval | Microsoft SSO Blocke.evidence: It's just that sometimes third party applications are blocked through their sso model, and that's what we use because we try to keep it as secure as possible.

HIPAA Compliance | Cost for Small Busine.evidence: I've asked support regarding hipaa compliance and it is only available for the enterprise users, which is 100 dollars, and that basically, I mean, I'm going to be upfront with you that's really not going to be too… much of a budget for us.

Pricing | Cost of Service.transcript_title: Excellent Real Estate Group, Inc <> Hiver

Pricing | Cost concerns.ask: We need a more affordable pricing option that fits within our budget.
Pricing | Cost concerns.evidence: Unfortunately, due to the cost being the main reason we won't be able to go ahead with you all as of now.

Pricing | Cost per user.ask: I don't want to pay for three people.
Pricing | Cost per user.evidence: But then, are we going to pay for Brenda? Because I just want to pay for two people? I don't want to pay for three people.

(no sub_theme).ask: We need the chat feature to integrate with Hubspot to access applicant profiles and CRM data during conversations.
(no sub_theme).evidence: I think that would be like a make or break for us because we use Hubspot for everything for like our CRM and that is like a lot of the time they'll come in and they'll have questions about like their applicant status or something and we need their profile like readily available.

SLA Issues | Outbound Emails.ask: Ensure SLAs do not trigger for outbound emails sent from our logistics team.
SLA Issues | Outbound Emails.evidence: It's saying the SLA is due to what's over June now, but Sarah's part of the logistics look.
SLA Issues | Outbound Emails.transcript_title: Hiver Trial Feedback <> Dr Paw Paw

SLA Tracking | Email Response Time.ask: We need the system to track every email response to ensure compliance with our 48-hour company-wide SLA.
SLA Tracking | Email Response Time.evidence: I don't think it's capturing all of our SLA, as we like our company wide SLA, which is that every email that's received has a 48 hour full business day response time.

Product Differentiation | Comparison wit.ask: Provide the main differentiators between Hiver and Zendesk in your email.
Product Differentiation | Comparison wit.evidence: Yeah. And, in your email to me, if you could put like the main differentiators to Zendesk in it because knowing that's what we use and then I can send that onto him.

Product Demo | Need for Tutorials.ask: We need to see a product demo or some tutorials about how to actually use the product correctly.
Product Demo | Need for Tutorials.evidence: Let me know. We need to see a product demo or some tutorials about how to actually use the product correctly.

Admin Access | Permission Approval.ask: We need a streamlined process for admin approval to avoid delays in setup.
Admin Access | Permission Approval.evidence: The only thing is, I don't think Tommy's on this call and he is the only one who has access or admin access right now.
